comments_since_last_sample.body: We Americans had better listen to this and listen well. Because we are heading that way. Listen to the words of Martin Luther King.

The election of 2020 was fraudulent. Thats what the world knows. 

Even 30 plus percent of democrats admit to believing that Biden only won because of cheating. Not that 30 plus percent admit to believing there was fraud in the election of 2020 but specifically that Biden only won because of cheating. 

Almost 60 percent of republicans admit that they believe Biden won because of cheating. 

50 percent plus of independents and undecided admit that they believe Biden won because of cheating. 

You can stop pushing your fair elections propaganda because most of the common people are not falling for your propaganda.

Remind me Ari....why is UK holding Julian Assange pending extradition? Extradition to which country? On what charges? He's not been arrested in the UK......he's just waiting for the USA to up their case so they can send Assange to prison for publishing information. Reminds you of Putin doing the same to journalists in Russia? So get off your moral hypocritical high ground....
